TopicTitle: Mechjeb Not working in lastest version

Articles.Content: I downloaded the Mechjeb from version 19 and its not working in the latest version. I am wondering if I installed it wrong, or prehaps there is a later version of mechjeb that has been released. Can someone more knowledgeable point me in the right direction?
I would advise searching first but for now here: For 0.21 download here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PART-0-21-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-9

Hey thanks a lot! That worked for me. Unfortunately Kerbal Started acting weird after a few flights. I went to the space plane hanger and when I went to take off my gimbal was rotated 90 degrees to the side. So the orange was on the right and the blue on the left. I cannot figure it out. Now when I activate the space plane guidance my plane flys on its side. All the controls are swapped around to match.

Not only that, but after I try to fly like that and then go back to the main area where you can click the buildings, none of them get highlighted by the cursor and I cannot select any of the buildings except the "training academy." What I am doing now is re-installing Kerbal to see if that fixes it. I am using a MAC.

Also I'll post a link to the space plane I uploaded on spaceport. Its a really interesting design that can fly a pilot into space and meet up with a space station.
